item.title: The Klem Lab Officially Launches at LSU
item.description:
The Klem Research Group will open its doors this Fall 2025 at Louisiana State University! ðŸŽ‰

Our lab focuses on integrative computational modeling of enzymes to address critical challenges in medicine and sustainability, including antibiotic resistance and plastic degradation. We’re building tools like QMzyme to make quantum enzymology more accessible, and weâ€™re excited to kick off collaborations, software development, and new research directions.

If you’re interested in joining the team or learning more about our work, visit the Join page or check out our Research areas.

Stay tuned â€” we have exciting updates ahead!
